definitions.definition: To supply with energy , especially electricity ; to turn on power to (something).
examples: Whenever we energize that circuit we blow a fuse.

definitions.definition: To use strength in action; to act or operate with force or vigor; to act in producing an effect.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To invigorate ; to make energetic .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To supply with energy , especially electricity ; to turn on power to (something).
( intransitive , obsolete ) To use strength in action; to act or operate with force or vigor; to act in producing an effect.
